scenario.name: Update EPA gateway time
scenario.step: I execute "Log In to Hub as Admin" reusable step
I execute "Admin Hub Navigate to Applications list" reusable step
I click on the "Direct App Admin Apprenticeships Tab" link by JS
I fill the "Direct App Admin Filter By User" field with "AutomationEPAUser1@harakirimail.com"
I press "MD_COMMON_KEYBOARD_ENTER" for "Direct App Admin Filter By User"
I click on the "Show" "button"
I capture text data "BPP Digital Admin Applications Overall Off the Job training hours" as "EC_JOB_TRAINING_HOURS" variable
I click on the "Application BPP Professional Apprenticeships" "BPP Digital Admin Applications Edit button"
I wait for "3" seconds
I validate text "Overwritten EPA gateway time" to be displayed for "BPP Digital Admin Overwritten EPA gateway time label" element
I validate text "CONTAINS=The standard EPA gateway time is 12 weeks" to be displayed for "BPP Digital Admin Overwritten EPA gateway time tooltip message" element
I fill the "BPP Digital Admin Overwritten EPA gateway time input field" field with "-2"
I click on the "Save" "BPP Digital Admin Value attribute button"
I validate text "Overwritten epa gateway time in weeks must be greater than 0" to be displayed for "BPP Digital Admin Overwritten EPA gateway validation error message" element
I fill the "BPP Digital Admin Overwritten EPA gateway time input field" field with "2.2"
I click on the "Save" "BPP Digital Admin Value attribute button"
I validate text "Overwritten epa gateway time in weeks must be an integer" to be displayed for "BPP Digital Admin Overwritten EPA gateway validation error message" element
I fill the "BPP Digital Admin Overwritten EPA gateway time input field" field with "1000"
I click on the "Save" "BPP Digital Admin Value attribute button"

I validate text "Overwritten epa gateway time in weeks EPA Gateway Time cannot be longer than the duration of the full programme." to be displayed for "BPP Digital Admin Overwritten EPA gateway validation error message" element
I fill the "BPP Digital Admin Overwritten EPA gateway time input field" field with "7"
I click on the "Save" "BPP Digital Admin Value attribute button"
I remember "KW_AUTO_TODAY" text as "EC_DATE_TODAY" variable
I validate text "CONTAINS=EC_DATE_TODAY" to be displayed for "BPP Digital Validate Note Date" element
I validate text "CONTAINS=EPA Gateway Time amended to 7" to be displayed for "BPP Digital Validate Note Message" element
I validate text "NOT_CONTAINS=EC_JOB_TRAINING_HOURS" to be displayed for "BPP Digital Overall Off the Job Training Hours" element
I should scroll to the "top" of the page
I click on the "Application BPP Professional Apprenticeships" "BPP Digital Admin Applications Edit button"
I wait for "3" seconds
I fill the "BPP Digital Admin Overwritten EPA gateway time input field" field with "4"
I click on the "Save" "BPP Digital Admin Value attribute button"
I validate text "CONTAINS=EC_DATE_TODAY" to be displayed for "BPP Digital Validate Note Date" element
I validate text "CONTAINS=EPA Gateway Time amended to 4" to be displayed for "BPP Digital Validate Note Message" element
I validate text "CONTAINS=EC_JOB_TRAINING_HOURS" to be displayed for "BPP Digital Overall Off the Job Training Hours" element
I click on the "Submit" "BPP Digital Admin Value attribute button"
I wait for "3" seconds
I select "In review" from "Direct App Admin Force Change Status Dropdown" element
I click on the "Change" "button"
I set "MD_COMMON_CREDENTIALS_BUILDEMPIRENEILADMINPASSWORD" text to the "Password" "Build Empire text field"
I click on the "OK" "button"

I capture text data "Salesforce Instance Availability Data Field" as "EC_AVAILABILITY_NUMBER" variable
I hover over the "Accounts" "Salesforce navigation menu dropdown"

I wait for "2" seconds
I click on the "New Account" "Salesforce navigation menu dropdown option"

I click on the "Next" "button"
I set "Auto[FIRSTNAME]" text to the "First Name" "Salesforce text field"

I click on the "Student Type" "Salesforce dropdown field"
I click on the "Domestic" "option"

I click on the "Gender" "Salesforce dropdown field" by JS
I click on the "Male" "option"
I set "Canada" text to the "Primary Nationality" "Salesforce search field"
I click on the "Canada" "option"
I click on the "Domicile" "Salesforce dropdown field" by JS
I click on the "Canada" "Salesforce dropdown field option" by JS
I click on the "Preferred Phone" "Salesforce dropdown field" by JS
I click on the "Home" "Salesforce dropdown field option" by JS
I set "[PHONE]" text to the "Home Phone" "Salesforce text field"
I set "Auto[EMAIL-HARAKIRI]" text to the "Personal Email" "Salesforce text field"
I click on the "Preferred Email" "Salesforce dropdown field" by JS
I click on the "Personal" "Salesforce dropdown field option" by JS
I wait for "1" seconds
I click on the "Save" "button"
I execute "Create Address" reusable step
I execute "Create Business Account" reusable step
I execute "Create Address Business Account" reusable step
I execute "Create Business Opportunity" reusable step
I click on the "EC_AUTO_OPPORTUNITY" "Salesforce link"
I click on the "Salesforce Create Quote" element
I wait for "3" seconds
I click on the "Salesforce Quote Save" button
I click on the "Salesforce Quotes Quick Link Tab" element
I click on the "Salesforce Quotes First Link" element
I wait for "5" seconds
I capture current URL as "EC_QUOTE_URL" variable
I click on the "Salesforce Quotes Edit Lines" element
I wait for "10" seconds
I hover over the "Salesforce Quotes Add Products" button
I click on the "Salesforce Quotes Add Products" element
I fill the "Salesforce Quotes Search Products" field with "MD_COMMON_VALIDDATA_SFCPQPRODUCT"
I press "MD_COMMON_KEYBOARD_ENTER" for "Salesforce Quotes Search Products"
I click on the "Salesforce Quotes Product Checkbox" option
I click on the "Salesforce Quotes Select Product Button" element
I wait for "2" seconds
I click on the "Salesforce Quotes Select Product Page Save" element
I click on the "Salesforce Quotes Edit" element
I click on the "Salesforce Quotes Ordered Checkbox" element by JS
I click on the "Salesforce Quote Booking Type Dropdown" element
I click on the "Salesforce Quote Booking Type Apprenticeships Chargeable" element

I click on the "Salesforce Quote Edited Save" element
I wait for "10" seconds
I am on "EC_QUOTE_URL" URL
I wait for "1" seconds
I click on the "Salesforce Orders Quick Link Tab on Quote Page" element
I click on the "Salesforce Orders First Link" link
I wait for "1" seconds
I execute "Add A Booking" reusable step
I am on "MD_COMMON_LINKS_SALESFORCEINSTANCE" URL
I wait for "2" seconds
I should see the "[SUM(EC_AVAILABILITY_NUMBER,-1)]" element
I capture text data "Salesforce Instance Availability Data Field" as "EC_MINUSONE_BOOKING" variable

I click on the "Salesforce Quotes Edit" element
I wait for "2" seconds
